Provider.PluginDescription: Reports the Internet Service Provider of the visitors.
Provider.ProviderReportDocumentation: This report shows which Internet Service Providers your visitors used to access the website. You can click on a provider name for more details. %s If Piwik can't determine a visitor's provider, it is listed as IP.
Provider.ProviderReportFooter: Unknown provider means the IP address could not be looked up.
